testcase.name: Kullanıcı (Personel) Fatura Ödeme işlemine gidebilir/Kullanıcı daha sonra hastaya gönderilen faturayı görebilir
testcase.system-out: Given USyirmiuc Personel Medunna adresine gider.............................passed Then USyirmiuc Personel Sing in simgesine tiklar............................passed And USyirmiuc Personel Sing in e tiklar.....................................passed And USyirmiuc Personel Username girer.......................................passed And USyirmiuc Personel Password girer.......................................passed And USyirmiuc Personel Sing in butonuna tiklar..............................passed And USyirmiuc Personel My Page sekmesine tiklar.............................passed And USyirmiuc Personel My Page sekmesinde Search Patient sekmesine tiklar...passed And USyirmiuc Personel Patient SSN searchbox a hastanin SSN numarasini girer.passed And USyirmiuc Personel Show Appointments kutucugunu tiklar..................passed And USyirmiuc Statusu Completed olan hastada Payment Invoice Process i tiklar.passed And USyirmiuc Personel Patment Detail i gorur...............................passed And USyirmiuc Personel Show Invoice tiklar..................................passed And USyirmiuc Personel hastaya gondereilen faturayi gorur...................passed And USyirmiuc sayfayi kapatir...............................................passed
